snippet: Cornelius Gurlitt left the trove of European art works collected by his father under the Nazis to the Kunstmuseum Bern in Switzerland.
abstract: Cornelius Gurlitt left the trove of European art works collected by his father under the Nazis to the Kunstmuseum Bern in Switzerland.

byline.original: By MELISSA EDDY and ALISON SMALE

headline.main: Son of Nazi-Era Art Dealer Left Works to Swiss Museum
headline.print_headline: Son of Nazi-Era Art Dealer Leaves Trove to Museum
